channel.title: How to make a can( coke or something) implode
channel.description:
Well first you need a good flame or so i did this in class so we used a bunsen burner but i guess you could use a jet lighter or something
1.empty or drink all of the soda then make sure the cans empty. 2.add about half a centimetre of water to it. 3.bring the can to a boil (untill steam rises out from the open hole*(drinking hole for you blondes :P)) 4.have a bucket of water or sink filled with water nearby. 5.Quickly grab the can with your tongs... then INVERT it into the water in the bucket and drop it in. be quick otherwise the water from the can falls out and you have to redo step 2 and 3 again. 6.If you have done it right the can should become instantly crushed up. 7. heres a link to see what happens, incase your scared or something it might blow up http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zl657tCCudw

wat[/quote]

item.title: How to make a can( coke or something) implode

item.description:
@Mattybr3h wrote:

Well first you need a good flame or so
i did this in class so we used a bunsen burner but i guess you could use a jet lighter or something

1.empty or drink all of the soda then make sure the cans empty.
2.add about half a centimetre of water to it.
3.bring the can to a boil (untill steam rises out from the open hole*(drinking hole for you blondes :P))
4.have a bucket of water or sink filled with water nearby.
5.Quickly grab the can with your tongs… then INVERT it into the water in the bucket and drop it in. be quick otherwise the water from the can falls out and you have to redo step 2 and 3 again.
6.If you have done it right the can should become instantly crushed up.
7. heres a link to see what happens, incase your scared or something it might blow up
